overview:
Dr. Georges Merx is a successful San Diego-based business owner and educator. He is the Managing Director of Belair Services International LLC and leads the online college Belair-Online (www.Belair-Online.com). He also teaches university and college courses at multiple institutions of higher learning in San Diego County.

Dr. Merx holds a PhD in Education from Claremont Graduate University and a Master of Science from San Diego State University. In his decades of progressive management, entrepreneurial, corporate, and creative experience, he has developed a range of business and education best practices that his company now applies to his business projects.
